landing-page.infoText: Our mission is to create a tool that allows you as lawyers to work together on a single doument and annotate it.
landing-page.logInInfo: To log in please enter your email and password
landing-page.firstNameError: First name must not be empty
landing-page.lastNameError: Last name must not be empty

reset.passwordResetInfo: Enter a new password and confirm it

profile.firstNameIsEmpty: First name must not be empty
profile.lastNameIsEmpty: Last name must not be empty
profile.emailInvalid: You did not enter a valid email address

about-us.text1: We are a team of four who developed this webapp for lawyers to collaborate with each other. Our mission is to create a tool that allows you as lawyers to collaborate and comment on a single document.
about-us.text2: We would also like to credit the icons we used on our website to flaticon and icos8.
